title: leavers
body: please riot this is like the third time i get leavers for nothing, i got leavers now because my pc crashed and it wasnt my fault, and also i think someone else is playing on my account becausei see in my history that i left matches but i dont leave any matches. ill change my password but please take my leavers away now, it really wasnt my fault my pc crashed. it also happend one time when we had a power outage ... Plz take away my leavers ..

replies.body: Leaverbuster is not something that can be moved, but standing with the system will improve with consistent uninterrupted play.  All leaves are treated equally because it still causes a negative experience for the other players in these matches.  Account security is important, and I recommend [changing your password ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)as soon as possible.  If you have further issues with your account, please [contact player support ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)right away to help you out further.
